name: A Sea of Dragons
description:
The Sea of Dragons is a Choose-Your-Own-Adventure story/game! Embark on a quest to rescue your sister from Dragons! You'll meet zany characters,  gamble, explore, and sail to Dragon Island (if you don't get yourself killed first)!

There are over 20 endings in this text-based fantasy adventure, some more difficult to find than others! Will you rescue your sister? Die a horrible death? Join a merry band of pirates? Only you can choose!
